remarks: Interchange order of multiplication.  Note that ` B ( j ) ` and ` D ( k ) ` are not necessarily constant expressions.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 1-Feb-2018.)
statement:
fprodcom2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fprodcom2.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. Fin ) $.
fprodcom2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ j e. A ) -> B e. Fin ) $.
fprodcom2.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( j e. A /\ k e. B ) <-> ( k e. C /\ j e. D ) ) ) $.
fprodcom2.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( j e. A /\ k e. B ) ) -> E e. CC ) $.
fprodcom2 $p |- ( ph -> prod_ j e. A prod_ k e. B E = prod_ k e. C prod_ j e. D E ) $.
$d A j k $.
$d B k $.
$d C j k $.
$d D j $.
$d j k ph $.
